Detailed Description

Base class for reader modules.

Reader modules access persistent data and pass them to the desired data structure by the means of a BaseImporter derivative. All reader modules must be derived from this class.

Member Function Documentation

virtual bool OpenMesh::IO::BaseReader::read ( const std::string &  _filename,
BaseImporter &  _bi,
Options &  _opt 
) [pure virtual]

Reads a mesh given by a filename.

Usually this method opens a stream and passes it to stream read method. Acceptance checks by filename extension can be placed here.

Options can be passed via _opt. After execution _opt contains the Options that were available

Implemented in OpenMesh::IO::_OBJReader_, OpenMesh::IO::_OFFReader_, OpenMesh::IO::_OMReader_, OpenMesh::IO::_PLYReader_, and OpenMesh::IO::_STLReader_.
